    hubspot

    The goal of hubspot is to enable access to Hubspot CRM data.

    Installation

    remotes::install_github("lockedata/hubspot")

    Example

    library(hubspot)
deal_props = get_deal_properties("demo")
deals = get_deals("demo", properties = deal_props, max_iter = 1)
